verbs.description: as waves of homeless descend onto trains l a [V: tries] [ARG1: a new strategy] metro has hired outreach workers who try to house the homeless who sleep on the subway the agency says its hope is that spending 1 2 million on helping homeless people instead of ticketing them may make a difference in the long run los angeles county california sarah caldwell sim harassment cypress park eric garcetti boyle springfield union station illinois
